page.title: 09BRYN-EVENTS IN VILLAGE/SCH.
page.content: EVENTS ARE HELD IN AND BY THE SCHOOL TO RAISE MONEY FOR SCHOOL FUNDS AND TO ENABLE PARENTS AND CHILDREN TO PARTICI -PATE IN THE SOCIAL LIFE OF THE VILLAGE. {ALL STARS XI V BRYN ROCKETS.FAMOUS {PAST PLAYERS SUCH AS IVOR ALLCHURCH, {MEL NURSE TOOK PART.(16/9/84). AUCTION-AT ROYAL OAK FOR SCHOOL FUND. {HAIR/BEAUTY-MRS.McCARTNEY & GIRLS FROM {MARGAM COLLEGE.(SCHOOL FUND) PIPPA-DEE PARTY-IN RUGBY CLUB(SCHOOL). {BRYN ROCKETS A.F.C. ANNUAL DINNER. BRYN WANDERERS CENTENARY SEASON. {SUMMER FAYRE -BRYN SCHOOL,OVER 12 {STALLS,POLICE 5-A-SIDE V. CHILDREN;TUG {OF WAR POLICE V. BRYN R.F.C.;PONY {RIDES. DENE MARSHALL JONES-AWARDED "YOUTH" CAP,W.R.U.YOUTH V. FRANCE & ENGLAND.
